verse:
मीनाः स्नानपराः फणी पवनभुङ्मेषश्च पर्णाशनो 
निराश:खलु चातको हि नितरां शेते बिले मूषकः । 
भस्मोध्द्वलन तत्परश्च हि खरो ध्यानाधिसरो बकस  
ते सर्वे न हि यान्ति मोक्षपदवीं भक्तिं बिना श्री हरे:॥
meaning: Meaning: Fishes and serpents are fond of bathing and digging up the earth, while they feed on leaves.Meaning: The chataka bird, always without hope, lies in a hole like a mouse.Meaning: The firefly is focused on ashes, while the ass is dedicated to meditation, and the heron.Meaning: All of them do not attain the abode of liberation without devotion to Lord Hari.Overall meaning: Fishes and serpents exhibit their natural behavior, while the chataka bird, firefly, ass, and heron engage in futile pursuits without achieving liberation. One can only attain the abode of liberation by cultivating devotion to Lord Hari.
